text: The Kia Sorento is a mid-size crossover SUV that is built by the Kia Motors company. The Sorento has had 2 generations during its time. The assembly for the Kia Sorento is in South Korea, United States and Kazakhstan. The current generation Sorento shares the same platform with the Hyundai Santa Fe. ==Other websites== *Kia Sorento at kia.ca Sorento Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Kia Sorento
